OwnerPage.firstParagraph: My name is Jon.  After graduating college with a Business/Marketing degree I decided to go into Finance.  After a little over seven years working for excel I decided I needed to shift gears and try a career in Software development.  It seems clear that, like most people, I did not know what I wanted.  It might seem like an odd transition, but in retrospect I think finance was the perfect segway into programming.
